description: This file defines an interface and implementations for an AI client, including a mock client and a wrapper around the OpenAI SDK, along with a factory function to instantiate the appropriate client based on configuration.

classes.name: ChatMessage
classes.description: TypedDict representing a chat message with role and content.

classes.name: AIClient
classes.description: Protocol defining the interface for AI client implementations, including the chat method.

classes.name: _MockAIClient
classes.description: Mock implementation of AIClient for testing, producing deterministic responses.

classes.name: _OpenAIClient
classes.description: Wrapper around the OpenAI SDK for real API calls, with safe import handling.

methods.name: get_ai_client
methods.description: Factory function returning an AI client instance based on configuration.
